response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 34
response.overview: The 34th installment in a popular series that introduces all 10 episodes of carefully selected scary footage that has been posted! So far, we have introduced strange phenomena that have been captured on home videos of ordinary households and ghosts that have slipped into surveillance cameras. This time as well, in "Fear Reflected in the Mirror", the contributors who discovered a merry-go-round that had been left tragically abandoned at an abandoned theme park, went into the fence out of curiosity, and that was it! to witness.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 34
